1st section.Define dates or subjects to choose: Define dates or subjects to choose from
1st section.Framadate is an online service for plann: Framadate is an online service for planning an appointment or making a decision quickly and easily. No registration is required.
1st section.Send the poll link to your friends or co: Send the poll link to your friends or colleagues

2nd section.This software needs javascript and cooki: This software needs JavaScript and cookies enabled. It is compatible with the following web browsers:
2nd section.a software developed by the University o: software developed by the University of Strasbourg. These days, it is developed by the Framasoft association.

3rd section.If you want to install the software for: If you want to install the software for your own use and thus increase your independence, we can help you at:
3rd section.To participate in the software developme: To participate in the software development, suggest improvements or simply download it, please visit

Check.Consider enabling the PHP extension Open: Consider enabling the PHP extension OpenSSL for increased security.
Check.Consider setting the date.timezone in ph: Consider setting the date.timezone in php.ini.
Check.Consider setting « session.cookie_httpon: Consider setting « session.cookie_httponly = 1 » inside your php.ini or add « php_value session.cookie_httponly 1 » to your .htaccess so that cookies can't be accessed through Javascript.
Cookies are served from HTTP only.
Check.PHP version %s is enough (needed at leas: PHP version %s is enough (needed at least PHP %s).
Check.The config file directory (%s) is not wr: The config file directory (%s) is not writable and the config file (%s) does not exists.
Check.The config file directory (%s) is writab: The config file directory (%s) is writable.
Check.The template compile directory (%s) does: The template compile directory (%s) doesn't exist in "%s". Retry the installation process.
Check.The template compile directory (%s) is n: The template compile directory (%s) is not writable.
Check.The template compile directory (%s) is w: The template compile directory (%s) is writable.
Check.You need to enable the PHP Intl extensio: You need to enable the PHP Intl extension.
Check.Your PHP version (%s) is too old. This a: Your PHP version (%s) is too old. This application needs at least PHP %s.

Comments.Add a comment to the poll: Add a comment to the poll

Date.Max dates count: You can select at most 4 months

EditLink.Here is the link for editing your vote:: Here is the link for editing your vote:
EditLink.If you don't want to lose your personali: If you don't want to lose your personalized link, we can send it to your email.
EditLink.Please wait %d seconds before we can sen: Please wait %d seconds before we can send an email to you then try again.
The email address is not correct.
EditLink.Your reminder has been successfully sent: Your reminder has been successfully sent!

Error.Can't create the config.php file in '%s': Can't create the config.php file in '%s'.
Error.Cookies are disabled on your browser. Th: Cookies are disabled on your browser. They are required to be able to create a poll.
Error.Enter a name and a comment!: Enter a name and a comment!
Error.Error on amount of voters limitation : v: Error on amount of votes limitation: Value must be an integer greater than 0
Error.Framadate is not properly installed, ple: Framadate is not properly installed, please see the 'INSTALL' file for instructions on setting up the database before continuing.
JavaScript is disabled on your browser. It is required to create a poll.
Error.Poll has been updated before you vote: Poll has been updated before you vote
Error.Something is wrong with the format: Something is wrong with the format
Error.Something is wrong with the format: cust: Something is wrong with the format: Customized URLs should only consist of alphanumeric characters and hyphens.
Error.Something is wrong with the format: name: Something is wrong with the format: name shouldn't have any spaces before or after
Error.The address is not correct! You should e: The address is not correct! You should enter a valid email address (like r.stallman@outlock.com) in order to receive the link to your poll.
Error.The name you've chosen already exist in: The name you've chosen already exists in this poll!
Error.There is a problem with your choices: There is a problem with your choices
Error.You can't create a poll with hidden resu: You can't create a poll with hidden results with the following option:
Error.You can't select more than %d dates: You can't select more than %d dates
Error.You haven't filled the first section of: You haven't filled in the first section of the poll.
Error.Your vote wasn't counted, because someon: Your vote wasn't counted, because someone voted in the meantime and it conflicted with your choices and the poll conditions. Please retry.

FindPolls.Here is the list of the polls that you m: Here is the list of the polls that you manage on %s:
FindPolls.If you weren't the source of this action: If you weren't the source of this action and if you think this is an abuse of the service, please notify the administrator at %s.
FindPolls.PS: this email has been sent because you: PS: this email has been sent because you – or someone else – asked to get back the polls created with your email address.

Step 1.All voters can modify any vote: All voters can modify any vote
Step 1.Limit the amount of voters per option: Limit the amount of voters per option
Step 1.Only the poll maker can see the poll's r: Only the poll maker can see the poll results
Step 1.Poll id rules: The identifier can contain letters, numbers and dashes "-".
Step 1.Poll id warning: By defining an identifier that can facilitate access to the poll for unwanted people. It is recommended to protect it with a password.
Required fields cannot be left blank.
Step 1.To make the description more attractive,: To make the description more attractive, you can use the Markdown format.
Step 1.To receive an email for each new comment: Receive an email for each new comment
Step 1.To receive an email for each new vote: Receive an email for each new vote
Step 1.Use a password to restrict access: Use a password to restrict access
Step 1.Voters can modify their vote themselves: Voters can modify their vote themselves
You are in the poll creation section.
Step 1.You can enable or disable the editor at: You can enable or disable the editor at will.

Step 2 classic.Add a link or an image: Add a link or an image
Step 2 classic.It's possible to propose links or images: Links or images can be included using
Step 2 classic.These fields are optional. You can add a: These fields are optional. You can add a link, an image or both.
Step 2 classic.To make a generic poll you need to propo: To create a poll you should provide at least two different choices.
Step 2 classic.You can add or remove additional choices: You can add or remove choices with the buttons

Step 2 date.Copy hours of the first day: Copy times from the first day
Step 2 date.For each selected day, you can choose, o: For each selected day, you are free to suggest meeting times (e.g., "8h", "8:30", "8h-10h", "evening", etc.)
Step 2 date.To schedule an event you need to propose: To schedule an event you need to provide at least two choices (e.g., two time slots on one day or two days).
Step 2 date.You can add or remove additionnal days a: You can add or remove additional days and times with the buttons

Step 3.Confirm the creation of your poll: Confirm the creation of your poll
Step 3.Once you have confirmed the creation of: Once you have confirmed the creation of your poll, you will automatically be redirected to the poll's administration page.
Step 3.Then, you will receive quickly two email: Then you will receive two emails: one containing the link of your poll for sending to the participants, the other containing the link to the poll administration page.
Step 3.You can set a closer archiving date for: You can set a specific expiry date for the poll.
Step 3.Your poll will automatically be archived: Your poll will automatically be archived
Step 3.Your poll will be automatically archived: Your poll will be automatically archived in %d days.
after the last date of your poll.

adminstuds.As poll administrator, you can change al: As poll administrator, you can change all the lines of this poll with this button
adminstuds.Finally, you can change the informations: Finally, you can change the properties of this poll such as the title, the comments or your email address.
adminstuds.If you just want to add a new hour to an: If you just want to add a new time slot to an existing date, add that date here and choose a new time slot.
adminstuds.You can add a new scheduling date to you: You can add a new scheduling date to your poll.
adminstuds.and add a new column with: and add a new column with
adminstuds.remove a column or a line with: remove a column or a line with

studs.If you want to vote in this poll, you ha: If you want to vote in this poll, you have to give your name, make your choice, and submit it by selecting the save button at the end of the line.
studs.POLL_LOCKED_WARNING: The administrator locked this poll. Votes and comments are frozen, it is no longer possible to participate
studs.The poll is expired, it will be deleted: The poll has expired, it will soon be deleted.
studs.Your vote has been registered successful: Your vote has been saved, but please note: you need to keep this personalised link to be able to edit your vote.
